name: Die Cook
description:
Presenting Die Cook, the first ever dice-based restaurant management game!
Open your dream business, upgrade and equip your kitchen, level up employees to customize their dice.
Express yourself with a customizable character and indoor decor.
Aim for a 5-star rating in this unique relaxing simulator!




🍳 Fulfill customer orders with your employees' dice each hour of the day.
📋 Hire, fire, and specialize your employees as they gain experience. Be sure to keep their compensation fair for their increasing skills.
🔪 Purchase upgrades with your profit to gain extra abilities, special dice, draw in more customers, and more!



🍰 Customize your Menu to be as focused and easy or as chaotic and difficult as you wish.
🎨 Beautiful isometric pixel art by Oray Studios.
🪑 Customize your restaurant's look by recoloring almost everything in it.
